You're registered!
{!CampaignMember.FirstName}, you have successfully registered for {!CampaignMember.Training_Name__c} with the Imagine Institute. All eligible participants will receive free STARS hours and {!CampaignMember.Training_Incentive__c} in a cash incentive upon completion of the training. Details are below!
When: {!CampaignMember.Training_Start_DateTime__c} - {!CampaignMember.Training_End_DateTime__c} Where: {!CampaignMember.C501_Training_Location_Text__c}
Food Provided: {!CampaignMember.Meal_Provided__c}
Please let us know if you won't be able to make it so we can let another provider take the class.
You may choose to attend multiple trainings but will receive one incentive per license, per fiscal year (July 1, 2019-June 30, 2020). Please allow up to 90 business days starting the following month of training for cash incentive.
Call us at 206-492-5249 or email training@imaginewa.org.
See you soon!
-The Imagine Institute
www.imaginewa.org
